message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product at a special price. I think you'll really love it!
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I'm interested, but that price is a little high for me. Would you consider $80?
I understand you're looking for a better deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $80. I'm willing to meet you halfway, though. How about $120?
I appreciate you working with me, Alice.  How about we settle at $100?
I'm glad you're still interested, Bob! I can see you're close to the value you have in mind. I'm willing to meet you at $110, but I'm not going to go any lower than that. What do you think?
